== Perungala (628281) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Perungala is a village in the [[Mavelikkara]] taluka of [[Alappuzha]] district with an area of 783 hectares and harbouring 3790 households with total population of 14151 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Mavelikkara]] is at a distance of 4 km. Male population is 6430 and female population is 7721. Scheduled Caste Population is 2133 and Scheduled Tribes population is 6. Census Location Code of the village is 628281<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 12555 (88.72%)
* Literate male population: 5718 (88.93%)
* Literate female population: 6837 (88.55%)
